div.div: Synchrotron scans for gut microbiota and dehydration experiments.
div.p: Synchrotron tomographic images (A,B,E,F,I,J) and drawings (C,D,G,H,K,L) of: (a,c) an antibiotic treated fly and (B,D) an untreated, wildtype fly, both fresh when entombed; (e,g) an antibiotic treated fly and (F,H) an untreated wildtype fly, both dried on the surface of the resin before complete entombment; and (I,K) an antibiotic treated fly, and (J,L) an untreated, wildtype fly, both dried isolated from the resin prior to complete entombment. Colours identical to Fig 2. White arrows indicate ruptured abdomens, and black arrows indicate bubbles. Scale bars = 1 mm.
